It ain't fake.  I have it (downloaded here) - tested and PROVEN to work.  No instructions, so here's da how:

1.  Copy the contents to the /BIN32 folder of your Crysis 3 Origin RIP download (any of the Origin RIPs - from base to Digital Deluxe).

2.  To run, either launch from a user-created desktop shortcut to the copied .EXE file, or simply run the executable in place.  (Either should work.)

3.  My test bed:

Intel Q6600 bone-stock
4 GB DDR2-800 SDRAM
AMD HD5450
Windows 8 Pro x64 with Media Center
Patched Crysis 3 Digital Deluxe - SG

If it works for me, it should work with much higher-end hardware than mine.
